app.name: sneek2sneekplus
app.long_description:
This is a simple application for Wii user to switch between SNEEK +/- DI.
Usage: To initialize prepare all required files in the appropriate folder of SD card. And use this application when running SNEEK (SD NAND).
Controls: Push button [A] to prepare for running SNEEK+DI and then to choose games use buttons [+],[-], and [A] for confirming the selection (Wii will reboot after this); Push button [B] to return to SNEEK (without DI); Push button [Home] to exit without switching.
Credits: crediar for developing emulated wiibrew application SNEEK, cwstjdenobs for BootMii Switch application, tona for AnyRegion and AnyTitle (used as template for this simple application).
